item.title: A Simple Finatra Example Project
item.description: Over the past year-and-a-half I’ve helped to develop a Scala framework for writing services on-top of parts of the Twitter stack, namely twitter-server and Finagle. This framework is called Finatra and we’ve recently published a second milestone release of the completely-rebuilt-from-the-ground-up version 2.x. I recently wrote a small Finatra example service that is a simple URL-shortener using Redis. The example builds with sbt and can be easily deployed to Heroku.
